Dashboard.title: Dashboard
Dashboard.aiProductAnalyzerDescription: Analyze reviews of your products using advanced AI

NegativeFeedbackTrend.title: Negative Feedback Trend
NegativeFeedbackTrend.description: Decrease in negative mentions vs. last month

AiAnalysis.title: AI Analysis
AiAnalysis.description: A quick breakdown of sentiment analysis and top insights from all sources.
AiAnalysis.overallSentiment: Overall sentiment is positive, with a slight increase in negative feedback on Twitter regarding packaging quality. Most praise is directed at product effectiveness and customer service.
AiAnalysis.insight1: A viral video on Snapchat discusses your product of rose perfumes, driving a 30% increase in mentions.
AiAnalysis.insight2: Customers on Amazon frequently mention the new "Oud" scent as a standout favorite.
AiAnalysis.insight3: Negative comments on Instagram are centered around the recent price increase for the body lotion.

MostDislikedProducts.title: Most Disliked Products
MostDislikedProducts.description: Products with the highest negative feedback.

MostLikedProducts.title: Most Liked Products
MostLikedProducts.description: Products with the highest positive feedback.

AiAnalyzerPage.enterUrl: Enter an Amazon product URL or ASIN to analyze product reviews and details
AiAnalyzerPage.inputPlaceholder: Enter Amazon URL or ASIN (e.g., https://amazon.com/dp/B07ZPKBL9V)
AiAnalyzerPage.readyDescription: Enter an Amazon product URL or ASIN above to get detailed product analysis and review insights

SettingsDescriptions.amazon: Sync products and orders from Amazon marketplace
